verses.name: Numbers 17:5
verses.text: And it shall come to pass, that the man’s rod, whom I shall choose, shall blossom: and I will make to cease from me the murmurings of the children of Israel, whereby they murmur against you.

verses.name: Numbers 17:6
verses.text: And Moses spake unto the children of Israel, and every one of their princes gave him a rod apiece, for each prince one, according to their fathers’ houses, even twelve rods: and the rod of Aaron was among their rods.

verses.name: Numbers 17:7
verses.text: And Moses laid up the rods before the Lord in the tabernacle of witness.
